column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Tokyo Yatai- I ventured out and tried this on one of my visits
column2: and this was interesting...It is a lighter broth because it has pork and chicken broth. with chicken chashu. You can tell the broth is lighter than the usual pork broth. Still good
column3: but it's not something I'm used to. If you're in the mood for something lighter
column4: I would highly recommend this one.
